scripts.build-frontend: cd udagram-frontend && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-backend: cd udagram-api && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.deploy-frontend: cd udagram-frontend && npm run deploy && cd ../
scripts.deploy-backend: cd udagram-api && npm run deploy && cd ../
scripts.start-frontend: cd udagram-frontend && npm run start && cd ../
scripts.start-backend: cd udagram-api && npm run dev && cd ../
scripts.test-backend: cd udagram-api && npm run test && cd ../
scripts.test-frontend: cd udagram-fronted && npm run test && cd ../
